item.title: Stuff
item.author: false
item.description: Here are a few of my favorite resources to learn Korean. Learn to Type in Korean: TaDak TaDak: Great web app to learn the basics. Fast Fingers (Korean Version): Fun web app to practice getting faster. The english version is pretty fun too. Help with Pronunciation: Motivate Korean’s Perfect Your Korean Pronunciation ($75): The best course I’ve found on korean pronunciation. Sweet and Tasty TV’s Korean Work of the Week Series: A fun, free way to learn korean pronunciation.
